entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 9:26 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:26 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
